title: Fontbase beta testers required.
content:
We are in the final part of testing our new Windows version of Fontbase and are looking for 2 or 3 more testers.

There is a brief description at:  
 [http://www.dtptypes.com/Fontbase/FontbaseDescription.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825041737/http:/www.dtptypes.com/Fontbase/FontbaseDescription.pdf "http://www.dtptypes.com/Fontbase/FontbaseDescription.pdf")

or a more comprehensive description at: (2.5mb)  
 [http://www.dtptypes.com/Fontbase/Fontbase.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825041737/http:/www.dtptypes.com/Fontbase/Fontbase.pdf "http://www.dtptypes.com/Fontbase/Fontbase.pdf")

if you are interested in doing some testing please email:  
 [fontbase@dtptypes.com](mailto:fontbase@dtptypes.com)

many thanks
author: malcolm
